summary: This module implements a FastAPI‑based layer that creates, configures, and manages generic pass‑through endpoints. It forwards incoming requests to external LLM services, handling request/response bodies, headers, streaming responses, and optional metadata tagging, while integrating with the proxy's logging and authentication mechanisms.
business_intent: Enable customers to expose custom proxy routes that simply relay calls to external AI providers, allowing flexible integration, custom routing, and centralized monitoring without modifying the core LLM handling logic.
